contentrichtext.text: <gallery> Image:[[Image:/tbZan-Rowe.jpg]]|Zan Rowe </gallery> '''Susanna "Zan" Rowe''' (b. March 1978, in [[Melbourne]]) is an Australian radio announcer, best known for her work on the nationally broadcast [[Triple J]]. ==Radio== Rowe started out at SRA FM in 1996 (now [[Student Youth Network|SYN Radio]]) on a show called ''Run with the hunted'', before moving to the Monday drive shift on premier community radio station [[3RRR]] 102.7FM presenting ''Transit Lounge'' from 2002–2004. In 2005, she took up a full-time position with [[Triple J]]. In 2006/7 she presented the 'Summer Lunch' (weekdays from 10 am – 2 pm). On 29 January 2007 Rowe replaced [[Mel Bampton]] on 'Mel in the Morning' (which had replaced 'The Morning Show' in 2004) in the 9 am to midday timeslot. Rowe also regularly fills in for music director [[Richard Kingsmill]] on the new releases show '2012' (named after the current year). ==Television== In 2009, Zan joined music presenter [[Richard Kingsmill]] in presenting a special edition of [[Rage (TV program)|rage]], ''[[Triple J Hottest 100 of All Time, 2009|Triple J Hottest 100 of All Time]]'', broadcast over two nights on the weekend of Friday 7 August 2009.<ref>{{Cite web| work = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation|ABC]] | title = rage : guests and specials : archive | url=http://www.abc.net.au/rage/guest/az_H.htm | accessdate=2010-03-12}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://zanrowe.com/ zanrowe.com] * VIDEO [http://www.abc.net.au/tv/fora/stories/2009/05/15/2571727.htm Zan Rowe and Craig Schuftan in conversation] on [http://www.abc.net.au/tv/fora/default.htm ABC FORA] *[http://www.abc.net.au/triplej/zan/ triple j: Mornings with Zan] *[http://www.abc.net.au/triplej/people/zan_rowe.htm triple j: people: Zan Rowe] {{Triple J}} {{Use dmy dates|date=June 2013}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Rowe, Zan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Australian radio personality | DATE OF BIRTH = 1978 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Rowe, Zan}} [[Category:1978 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Australian radio personalities]] [[Category:Triple J announcers]]
